name: Old Murk (DotFO)
description:
This game is all about surviving and killing those darn zombies! 

Mission: 
Try to survive as long as possible and get the highscore. Score: The longer you stay alive, the higher your score will be - and picking up packs(health/ammo) and of course... killing zombies. 

Ammo:
This is vital. Make your shots count because you don't wanna run out of ammo. Ammo packs spawn in the church and somewhere outside as well. Enjoy :)
